name: pod-protocol
description: PoD Protocol (Prompt or Die): The ultimate AI Agent Communication Protocol on Solana

scripts.build:idl: echo 'IDL generation skipped - requires Anchor CLI'
scripts.build:full: bun run build:safe && bun run build:idl
scripts.build:verify: bun run build:safe && bun run verify:build
scripts.build:all: cd sdk && bun run build:prod && cd ../cli && bun run build:prod
scripts.prebuild:all: cd sdk && bun install && cd ../cli && bun install
scripts.build:prod: bun run clean && bun run build:all
scripts.test: cd sdk && bun run test && cd ../cli && bun run test
scripts.test:all: bun run test && cd sdk && bun run test && cd ../cli && bun run test
scripts.test:coverage: cd sdk && bun run test:coverage && cd ../cli && bun run test:coverage
scripts.deploy:prod: echo 'Production deploy requires Anchor CLI - skipped'
scripts.clean: rm -rf target/ && cd sdk && bun run clean && cd ../cli && bun run clean
scripts.lint:all: bun run lint && cd sdk && bun run lint && cd ../cli && bun run lint
scripts.dev: cd sdk && bun run test && cd ../cli && bun run test
scripts.docs: cd programs/pod-com && cargo build && typedoc --out docs/api sdk/src/index.ts
scripts.docs:build: bun run docs && cd sdk && bun run docs
scripts.production:deploy: bun run production:test && bun run build:prod
scripts.ci:build: bun run build:verify && bun run build:all
scripts.ci:test: bun run test:all && bun run lint:all
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run production:test && bun run build:all

author: PoD Protocol Team
